import React from 'react' export default class Forms extends React.Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { post: '123', declarant: '123', passportSeries: '123', passportNumber: '123', passportGiveDate: '123', passportWhoGive: '123', addressIndex: '123', addressRegion: '123', addressLocation: '123', firmName: '123', firmCountry: '123', firmAddress: '123', transCost: '123', productInfo: [ { codeTNVD: '123', stakeTP: '123', productName: '123', productTarget: '123', productDescription: '123', сount: '123', spaceCount: '123', countKg: '123', invoiceCost: '123', invoiceCostSELECT: '123', grossWeight: '123', netWeight: '123' } ], consigmentNumber: '123', notifyNumber: '123', openAct: '123', invoiceCount: '123', additionalDoc: [ { document: '123' } ], } this.handlerChangeInfo = this.handlerChangeInfo.bind(this) this.addProduct = this.addProduct.bind(this) this.addAdditionalDoc = this.addAdditionalDoc.bind(this) this.saveDocument = this.saveDocument.bind(this) } handlerChangeInfo(evt) { let dataName = evt.target.name if (dataName.split('-').length === 1) { this.setState({[`${dataName}`]: evt.target.value}) } else { dataName = dataName.split('-') this.setState( (state) => { if (dataName[0] === 'productInfo') { const cloneProductInfo = Object.assign([], state.productInfo) cloneProductInfo[`${dataName[2]}`][`${dataName[1]}`] = evt.target.value return {productInfo: cloneProductInfo} } else if (dataName[0] === 'additionalDoc') { const cloneAdditionalDoc = Object.assign([], state.additionalDoc) cloneAdditionalDoc[`${dataName[2]}`][`${dataName[1]}`] = evt.target.value return {additionalDoc: cloneAdditionalDoc} } }) } } // handlerChangeInfoArr(evt) { //Array-field-index // // // cloneProductInfo[`${dataName[2]}`][`${dataName[1]}`] = evt.target.value // // return {productInfo: cloneProductInfo} // if (dataName[0] === 'productInfo') { // const cloneProductInfo = Object.assign([], state.productInfo) // cloneProductInfo[`${dataName[2]}`][`${dataName[1]}`] = evt.target.value // return {productInfo: cloneProductInfo} // } else if (dataName[0] === 'additionalDoc') { // const cloneAdditionalDoc = Object.assign([], state.additionalDoc) // cloneAdditionalDoc[`${dataName[2]}`][`${dataName[1]}`] = evt.target.value // return {additionalDoc: cloneAdditionalDoc} // } // }) // } addProduct() { this.setState( (state) => { const cloneProductInfo = Object.assign([], state.productInfo) const prodInfoItem = { codeTNVD: '', stakeTP: '', productName: '', productTarget: '', productDescription: '', сount: '', spaceCount: '', countKg: '', invoiceCost: '', invoiceCostSELECT: '', grossWeight: '', netWeight: '' } cloneProductInfo.push(prodInfoItem) return {productInfo: cloneProductInfo} }) } addAdditionalDoc() { this.setState( (state) => { const cloneAdditionalDoc = Object.assign([], state.additionalDoc) const additionalDocItem = { document: '' } cloneAdditionalDoc.push(additionalDocItem) return {additionalDoc: cloneAdditionalDoc} }) } saveDocument() { console.log(this.state) } render() { const state = this.state const productInfos = [] const additionalDocs = [] for (let i=0; i
